title: Computer Science
description: Computer science is the study of computers and computing as well as their theoretical and practical applications.

title: Data Science
description: Data science is an interdisciplinary field that uses scientific methods, processes, algorithms and systems.

title: Art & Design
description: An Art & Design degree includes creating expressive artwork and the implemen- tation of industry-changing designs.

title: Academics
description: An academic students get when they graduate from a university. It shows they successfully completed their courses.

title: Marketing & Business
description: Marketing & business refers to activities a company undertakes to promote the buying or selling of a product or service.

title: Finance & Business
description: Financing is the process of providing funds for business activities, making purchases, or investing.

title: Health & Fitness
description: Health means a person has good physical health, no injuries, diseases or issues, and good mental health and well being

title: Music & Dance
description: Dance needs music to set the mood, drop the beat, and create the motivation needed to start moving.

title: Happy Lifestyle
description: Feeling of truly enjoying your life, and the desire to make the very best of it. It is the secret sauce that can help us be and do our best.
